translation: La ãdsã sã n wa lʋɩtẽ.
La moagã sã n wa pus n yek tɑɑbɑ.
La kabɑ wã sã n wa bugsdẽ.
Yõor na bãng a sẽn tʋm tɩ reng taoor la a sẽn tʋm tɩ yaoole.

arabic_text: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ
translation: Yaa foo ninsaalã! Bõe n belg foom ne fo Soab wagellã,
Ning sẽn naan-a foo, n zems-f taab n tẽeg-f tɩrga?

arabic_text: فِيٓ أَيِّ صُورَةٖ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ
translation: Nɑɑnd ning A sẽn tʋll la A sigd foo.
Pa woto ye! Y kɩɩsda Rolbã raare.
La ad gũusdb n be yãmb zutu,
N yaa wagla, n yaa gʋlsdba.
La ad nin-wẽnsã bee Gεhɩɩm pʋgẽ.
La b pa na n tol n lill n bas-a ye.
La bõe n wilg foo Rolbã raare?

arabic_text: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ ٱلدِّينِ
translation: Rẽ poorẽ, bõe n wilgd foo Rolbã raare?

arabic_text: يَوۡمَ لَا تَمۡلِكُ نَفۡسٞ لِّنَفۡسٖ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَٱلۡأَمۡرُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلَّهِ
translation: Raar ning yõor sẽn pa so a yõ to ne ba fʋɩ; raaren-kãngã, yellã bee ne Wẽnde.
